description: Three anthropomorphic snakes are seated at a formal dinner table set with plates and silverware, facing a bowl filled with hamsters. One snake is wearing a pink dress with flowers. The scene creates an absurd juxtaposition of human domesticity, including a checkerboard floor and chairs, with the snakes' natural predatory diet. The dialogue highlights the mundane frustration of being served the same meal repeatedly, adding a layer of relatable humor to the surreal situation. This blend of the ordinary and the bizarre underscores the inherent absurdity of the scenario.
caption: “Oh, brother! ... Not hamsters again!”
